about_the_game:
The Adventure Begins

After emerging from a nightmare and healing from the loss of his right arm, Leth, the hero of this tale, must set out on a journey across various lands to retrieve the 4 crystals of Scarleth. Only then will he be able to restore what little is left of the once-great Scarlet Kingdom.

Game features

  • A vast world to explore! Dive into a land full of secrets, mysteries, villages, and enemies to face on your journey.

  • Accessories and items! Mythical and sacred elements that allow you to play with your preferred strategy.

  • Discover powerful alchemies! Combine different resources to create magical powers.

  • Uncover all the secrets! A mountain of secrets everywhere!

  • Leveling and upgrade system! You can level up and improve your weapons and armor in exchange for gold pieces at a blacksmith.

  • Full compatibility with keyboard and Xbox controller! You can control the game however you prefer.
